short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically activates when browsing Soundbay sites. Removes staff sessions and phone/internet orders from website analytics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to not track activity on Soundbay related sites (eg. StoreDJ.com.au and Mannys.com.au). It activates automatically when visiting these sites only. Highly useful for staff members as they don't need sales being tracked in google analytics etc.

It can be easily enabled or disabled with a simple click, and only works on the sites mentioned above.
